thread.title: no more areas

comments.text: i cant create anymore areas because of the "creation tools trial" which doesn't exist amymore
could you please explain what happens when you hit create area?
my ring says: "oops, you've reached the maximum number of areas on can create during the trial"
update v123.6 (your version: [version]): There should now be an appropriate message when that happens! Thanks!
